commit.message:
re PR c++/50207 (G++ segv's on reduced test case)

	PR c++/50207
	* class.c (finish_struct_1): Complain if the first field is
	artificial.

Co-Authored-By: Jason Merrill <jason@redhat.com>

From-SVN: r178276
